line1: My most recent personal project is an Androidâ„¢ application called Sudoku Mobile. Sudoku Mobile is built using React Native, Redux and Expo.
line2: It's free and does not contain any ads - for now - so if you like Sudoku or just puzzle games in general, give it a try! Please note that Sudoku Mobile is still in beta. Some performance optimisations, additional features and creature comforts are still on the way!
